original_text: None of the people who work in my house have ever said, “Job has not welcomed strangers into his house. He has not shared his food with them.” None of the people who work in my house have ever said, “Job has not welcomed strangers into his house. He has not shared his food with them.” None of the people who work in my house have ever said,
korean_text: 내 장막 사람들은 주인의 고기에 배부르지 않은 자가 어디 있느뇨 하지 아니하였는가

sentences.original_text: None of the people who work in my house
sentences.korean_translation: 내 집에서 일하는 사람 중 아무도

sentences.original_text: Job has not welcomed strangers into his house
sentences.korean_translation: 욥이 낯선 사람을 자기 집에 맞이하지 않았다고

sentences.original_text: He has not shared his food with them
